title: household_water_storage_tanks_3000_liters
summary: Household water storage tanks totaling 3000 liters: 2000L (blue) and 1000L (cream), estimated 14-day use for two people.
description: Documentation of household water storage system at MaMeeFarm. Two tanks are shown on an elevated platform: a blue tank with 2000-liter capacity and a cream tank with 1000-liter capacity, totaling 3000 liters. The recorded operational estimate indicates two people can use this stored water for approximately 14 days.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
